title: Carlos Reyes (Uruguayan footballer)
text:
Carlos Reyes Argibay (1957 – 11 June 2009) was an Uruguayan <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player and manager.
Career.
Born in <a href="Montevideo">Montevideo</a>, Reyes began playing as a creative midfielder for local side <a href="Club%20Nacional%20de%20Football">Nacional</a>, the club his parents supported. When he joined rivals <a href="C.A.%20Pe%C3%B1arol">Peñarol</a>, his family were upset. At age 29, Reyes moved abroad to play in <a href="El%20Salvador">El Salvador</a>, and ended his career playing in Honduras with <a href="Real%20Espa%C3%B1a">Real España</a> and in Guatemala with <a href="Aurora%20F.C.">Aurora</a>.
